attributes.action: Make Jeremy Hunt resign to save the NHS
attributes.background: Despite an overwhelming chorus of junior doctors pleading to cancel his contract, Jeremy Hunt has ignored every voice except his own. His contract will ruin the NHS as we know it and will put to much strain on junior doctors who already work long hours 7 days a week. Stand up for the NHS.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
